name: KlayFi Finance
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: KlayFi is a Yield Optimizer that provides the user-oriented Yield Farming experience to KLAYswap users. In addition to convenient auto-farming, earn maximum yield returns by utilizing the governance and economy of KLAYswap.
